title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 8 categories on the x axis representing Breakdown of Project, and Costs in million U.S. dollars in each Breakdown of Project on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Stadium construction & renovation where Costs in million U.S. dollars is 3600.0.
Followed by 3400.0 in Urban mobility projects.
The lowest category is found at Tourism infrastructure projects where Costs in million U.S. dollars is 76.0.
The highest value at Stadium construction & renovation is almost 47.37 times larger than the minimum value of Tourism infrastructure projects.
The highest value at Stadium construction & renovation is almost 47.37 times larger than the minimum value of Tourism infrastructure projects.
The difference between the max Breakdown of Project Stadium construction & renovation and min Breakdown of Project Tourism infrastructure projects is 3524.0.
